directions: Combine rice noodles, peanuts, vegetables, powdered peanut butter, chicken bouillon, cilantro, chia seeds, salt, garlic powder, ginger, garlic powder, black pepper, and cayenne pepper in a resealable plastic bag. Remove air and seal.
Reconstitute rice noodle mixture by pouring in 1 cup boiling water. Mix well and let cook until noodles and vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons powdered peanut butter (such as PB2®)
title: Backpackers' Thai Noodles
